Header.title: Freeman | Art Company
Header.paragraph: Freeman Art Company is an art gallery designed for the modern "artrepenuer." Discover more ways to market your works, build your brand, and establish yourself amongst peers.

About.paragraph: Freeman Art Company is an art logistics platform connecting artists to collectors in a way that supports rising artists while exposing the community to the arts. We use technology to elevate the scope and magnitude of your ability.
About.subparagraph: Our mission is to humanize art so that all may enjoy this beautiful part of life. We do this by revolutinizing how art is pucharsed, and how artists connect with collectors and their peers alike. For the collector, their home becomes a gallery, providing new experiences year round. For the artist, their phones become a tool to earn monthly income.

Services.name: Earn through likes
Services.text: Every "like" earned through your content, you earn money.

Services.name: The business partner you need.
Services.text: You focus on the art and lifestyle, we handle the boring business stuff.

Services.name: Connect with your peers
Services.text: Establish ethos, form partnerships, get connected through the form.

Services.name: Rotate
Services.text: Why limit your sales to purchases? How about rotating galleries?

Services.name: Finance your art, keep the interests
Services.text: Artists have the option to finance their art. You choose the rate, term length, safety deposit.

Services.name: Sell art, keep the money
Services.text: Finally! A gallery that gives you exposure at only 5% commission

Features.title: Micro-Entrepreneurs
Features.text: Our platform provides you with the tools that will help you make a living from what you love.

Features.title: Monthly Income
Features.text: Subscriptions to your art are paid monthly. Collectors can even pay over-time.

Features.title: Hosting Gallery
Features.text: We provide you with a personalized gallery and profile, it's just as easy as logging in.
